title: FIX: Session limit enforcement
body: Implement logic to enforce max-active-sessions. When session count exceeds limit, revoke oldest active session.

title: FIX: Timing attack mitigation
body: Implement constant-time password comparison, fake user flow, and random delays to prevent username enumeration.

title: FIX: Remove debug unlock controller
body: Remove or restrict /auth/debug endpoints. They must never exist in production.

title: FIX: Input validation & sanitization
body: Add strict regex validation for username/password, sanitize all string inputs, enforce request size limits, block XSS/SQL injection.

title: FIX: Rate limit bypass prevention
body: Validate X-Forwarded-For, implement IP + user-based limits, add distributed-IP detection, prevent header spoofing.

title: FIX: Vault secret management
body: Remove hardcoded Vault token. Implement AppRole auth, fallback backup, token renewal, and fail-fast disabled.

title: FIX: Redis high availability (Auth)
body: Switch from single Redis to Sentinel/Cluster. Add circuit breaker fallback when Redis down.

title: FIX: Session cleanup batching
body: Rewrite cleanup job to delete expired sessions in batches to avoid table locks.

title: FIX: Gateway circuit breakers
body: Add Resilience4j circuit breakers on auth/profile routes to prevent cascading failures.

title: FIX: Gateway request/response logging
body: Add correlation IDs, MDC logging, latency tracking, structured logs.

title: FIX: Gateway rate limiting
body: Implement Redis-backed rate limiting at gateway to protect backend services.

title: FIX: Actuator endpoint security
body: Restrict actuator endpoints to internal network. Expose only health + prometheus.

title: FIX: Gateway routing integration tests
body: Add full WebTestClient integration tests verifying routing, JWT validation, JWKS refresh.

title: FIX: Profile admin role enforcement
body: Restrict all profile admin endpoints using role validation. Only ADMIN role can approve/reject documents.

title: FIX: Document ownership validation
body: Ensure users can upload and manage ONLY their own documents. Reject mismatched user IDs.

title: FIX: Storage service implementation
body: Implement S3-based presigned URL generation for uploads. Replace placeholder with real upload logic.

title: FIX: Header validation
body: Validate X-User-ID for UUID format. Reject requests not sent from gateway. Enforce mTLS origin.

title: FIX: Enforce mTLS between Gateway â†’ Profile
body: Enable HTTPS on profile service with client cert validation. Reject non-gateway callers.

title: FIX: Remove hardcoded DB credentials
body: Move DB creds from YAML to environment variables or Vault.

title: FIX: Restrict Kafka trusted packages
body: Whitelist only required packages for JSON deserialization to prevent RCE.

title: FIX: R2DBC transaction test isolation
body: Enable transactional operator + rollback strategy for reliable reactive integration tests.

title: FIX: Event schema registry
body: Introduce Avro schema registry for versioned event definitions. Prevent breaking event changes.

title: FIX: Event delivery guarantees
body: Add ack checking + retry for Kafka producer publishes. No fire-and-forget.

title: FIX: Distributed tracing
body: Integrate Sleuth + Zipkin for full request trace across all services.

title: FIX: Password reset flow
body: Implement forgot-password + reset-password endpoints. Secure token, TTL, single-use, Redis storage.

title: FIX: Replay protection
body: Add timestamp + nonce validation to refresh requests. Store nonce in Redis to block replay.

title: FIX: Error handling standardization
body: Ensure all services return consistent JSON error format. Add global exception handler.

title: FIX: Service-to-service RBAC
body: Add authorization layer for mTLS service calls. Enforce which service may call which endpoint.

title: FIX: JWKS synchronization safety
body: Improve gateway JWKS refresh handling. Add old key retention + faster refresh.

title: FIX: Kafka consumer implementations
body: Add consumers for trip.completed, rating.submitted, and update driver stats.

title: FIX: Email/phone validation
body: Add strict validation for email and E164 phone format in profile service.

title: FIX: Audit log retention policy
body: Add retention config, cleanup job, and cold storage archiving.

title: FIX: Remove deprecated lockout field
body: Remove unused lockout_end_time column + corresponding code.

title: FIX: Remove deprecated SecureController
body: Delete unused /secure/info endpoint and related config.

title: FIX: Cleanup unused RateLimiter reset code
body: Move test-only methods to test package or annotate properly.

title: FIX: Create shared libraries
body: Extract common DTOs, security utils, metrics utils into /libs folder.

title: FIX: Zero-downtime DB migrations
body: Adopt expand-contract migration pattern with validation.

title: FIX: Deterministic UUID generation for tests
body: Add UuidGenerator abstraction with deterministic test implementation.
